original_text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant, even as I had pity on thee?
korean_text: 내가 너를 불쌍히 여김과 같이 너도 네 동료를 불쌍히 여김이 마땅하지 아니하냐 하고

sentences.original_text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 또한 긍휼히 여기지 않았어야 했느냐

sentences.original_text: even as I had pity on thee?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 불쌍히 여긴 것과 같이 말이냐?
